sentences.sContent: Teachers will be asked to fill in a questionnaire.
sentences.sCn: 教师们将被要求填写一份调查问卷。

remMethod.val: question(问题) + naire → 有问题的卷子 → 调查表

trans.tranCn: 调查表； 问卷， 征求意见表
trans.tranOther: a written set of questions which you give to a large number of people in order to collect information
